artist: Artist: Mary Esch; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: title page, text page, and twelve prints in black on cream; line drawing-style with woman in checked skirt, men and animals in landscapes; blue-green cover. Former Classification: Prints - Portfolio
inscription: Signature, title, date, edition and mark
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: below each image, in pencil: [MARY ESCH   THREE QUESTIONS (plate number, in Roman numerals) 2/12 2003]
title: Three Questions
